  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109997</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109997</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Antibiotic sensitivity test</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antibiotischer Empfindlichkeit Test</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essai antibiotique de sensibilité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste antibiótico da sensibilidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova antibiotica di sensibilità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιβιοτική δοκιμή ευαισθησίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prueba antibiótica de la sensibilidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the results of an antibiotic sensitivity test for Escherichia coli. The diameters of the inhibition zones for antibiotics A-F determine the resistance and sensitivity of the pathogenic strain to the antibiotic.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antibiotic sensitivity test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Escherichia coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inhibition zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pathogenic strain</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Resultate eines 
antibiotischen Empfindlichkeit Tests für Escherichia Coli. Die 
Durchmesser der Hemmungzonen für Antibiotika A-F stellen den 
Widerstand und die Empfindlichkeit der pathogenen Belastung zum 
Antibiotikum fest.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les résultats d'un 
essai antibiotique de sensibilité pour Escherichia coli. Les 
diamètres des zones d'inhibition pour les antibiotiques A-F 
déterminent la résistance et la sensibilité de la contrainte 
pathogène à l'antibiotique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os resultados de um 
teste antibiótico da sensibilidade para escherichia coli. Os 
diâmetros das zonas da inibição para os antibióticos A-F 
determinam a resistência e a sensibilidade da tensão pathogenic ao 
antibiótico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i risultati di una 
prova antibiotica di sensibilità per Escherichia coli. I 
diametri delle zone di inibizione per gli antibiotici A-F determinano 
la resistenza e la sensibilità dello sforzo patogeno all'antibiotico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τα αποτελέσματα μιας 
αντιβιοτικής δοκιμής ευαισθησίας για Escherichia coli. 
Οι διάμετροι των ζωνών παρεμπόδισης για τα αντιβιοτικά AF
καθορίζουν την αντίσταση και την ευαισθησία της παθογόνου πίεσης 
στο αντιβιοτικό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los resultados de una 
prueba antibiótica de la sensibilidad para los escherichia coli. 
Los diámetros de las zonas de la inhibición para los 
antibióticos A-F determinan la resistencia y la sensibilidad de la 
tensión patógena al antibiótico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">antibiotischer Empfindlichkeit Test</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Escherichia Coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hemmungzone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pathogene Belastung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">essai antibiotique de sensibilité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Escherichia coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zone d'inhibition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">contrainte pathogène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">teste antibiótico da sensibilidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escherichia coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">zona da inibição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tensão pathogenic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prova antibiotica di sensibilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Escherichia coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">zona di inibizione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sforzo patogeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντιβιοτική δοκιμή ευαισθησίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Εσθχερηθχηα coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζώνη παρεμπόδισης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παθογόνος πίεση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">prueba antibiótica de la sensibilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escherichia coli</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">zona de la inhibición</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tensión patógena</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
